message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. As a starting point, I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
